metadata.title: CVE-2024-22386 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's drm/exynos device driverin exynos_drm_crtc_atomic_disable() function. This can result in a nullpointer dereference issue, possibly leading to a kernel panic or denial ofservice issue.
